𓂧 χειρό < dast 𐊢 CARIAN LETTER D

𓄜 తోలు tōlu 𓄛 தோல் (tōl) തൊലി (/t̪oli/), തോല് (/t̪oːlɨ̆/) (hide), തോൽ (/t̪oːl/) (hide)

𔗐 𔗎 𔗏 𔗏𔗎 𔗎𔗏 𔖶 𔖷 𓍸 𓍷 𓍶 𓍲

IPA values

/k/ as in come
/s/ as in center
/ts/ as in Center = Zentrum (German)

/ç/ ch as in "Licht"
/x/ ch as in "Lachen"
/ˈt͡ʃ/ ch as in "china" english
/ˈʃ/ ch as in "China" northern
/ˈki/ ch as in "China" southern
